column1: Sahiwal – Montgomery – (Punjabi and Urdu: ساہِيوال‎) is a division in Punjab
column2: Pakistan. It is the administrative center of Sahiwal (Montgomery) District and Sahiwal (Montgomery) Division. It is the 21st largest city of Pakistan by population. Sahiwal is approximately 180 km from the major city Lahore and 100 km from Faisalabad and lies between Lahore and Multan.
